ARABIC: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنزَلَ ٱلْكِتَٰبَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَٱلْمِيزَانَ وَمَا يُدْرِيكَ لَعَلَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ قَرِيبٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: It is Allah who has sent down the Book with truth and with the Just Balance. What will make you realise? Perhaps the Hour is close.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: It is God who has sent down the Book with the truth, and the Balance. How do you know the Hour is not near?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Allah it is Who sent down this Book with the Truth and the Balance. And what would make you know that the Hour (of Judgement) has drawn near?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It is God who revealed the Book and the Balance for a truthful purpose. You never know. Perhaps the Hour of Doom is close at hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: It is Allah Who has sent down the Book with the truth, and the Scales of Justice; and what do you know – possibly the Last Day could really be near!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: It is Allah Who has sent down the Book in truth, and the Balance. And what can make you know that perhaps the Hour is close at hand
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Allah it is Who revealed the Book with truth, and the balance, and what shall make you know that haply the hour be nigh?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: God it is who has sent down the Book with the truth, and also the Balance. And what shall make thee know? Haply the Hour is nigh.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Allah it is Who hath revealed the Scripture with truth, and the Balance. How canst thou know? It may be that the Hour is nigh.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: It is God who has sent down the Book with the truth and the scales of justice. What will make you realize that the Hour might well have drawn near?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Allah it is Who hath sent down the Book with the truth and the balance. And what shall make thee know the Hour may haply be nigh.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: It is Allah who has sent down the Book with the truth and [He has sent down] the Balance. What do you know—maybe the Hour is near!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: It is Allah Who has sent down the Book in Truth, and the Balance (by which to weigh conduct). And what will make thee realise that perhaps the Hour is close at hand?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: It is Allah Who has sent down the Book (the Quran) in truth, and the Balance (i.e. to act justly). And what can make you know that perhaps the Hour is close at hand?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: It is Allah who has sent down the Book in truth and the Scale. And what will let you know? The Hour is near.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: It is God who revealed the Book with the truth, and the Balance. And what will make you realize that perhaps the Hour is near?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: It is Allah who has sent down the Book in truth and [also] the balance. And what will make you perceive? Perhaps the Hour is near.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [42:17] God it is Who has revealed the Book, the Qur’ān, with the truth (bi’l-haqqi is semantically connected to anzala, ‘revealed’) as well as the Balance, Justice. And what do you know — perhaps the Hour, that is, its arrival, is near! (la‘alla, ‘perhaps’, comments on the verb describing the action, with what follows it functioning as two direct objects).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Allah it is who hath revealed the Scripture) He sent Gabriel with the Qur'an (with truth) to explain the Truth and falsehood, (and the Balance) and exposited therein justice. (How canst thou know) Muhammad? (It may be that the Hour is nigh) it may be that the Hour is coming soon.
